custom_functional_tools.name: book_appointment
custom_functional_tools.description: Useful for starting appointment booking procedure. Takes a single input dictionary containing session_id, doctor_name, appointment_time, appointment_day. Make sure to convert the appointment_time to 24hr time format or HH:MM AM/PM format before calling this function. Returns booking_id, appointment_time, appointment_day, appointment_date contained in a string.
